title: 5 Ayurvedic Medicine For Blood Pressure(BP) Control
author: Admin
description: Ayurvedic medicines are a healthy and natural alternative to controlling blood pressure. Here are 5 Ayurvedic medicines for blood pressure control.
cleaned_text: High Blood Pressure is a major health problem in India. Chances are, you definitely know someone close to you who has to keep a check on their blood pressure. Here Are 5 Ayurvedic Medicines For Blood Pressure: 1. Amla Amla or Indian Gooseberry is an effective ayurvedic medicine for blood pressure. It has Vitamin C which helps reduce blood cholesterol levels and widens blood vessels. If you have amla juice every morning on an empty stomach it can control hypertension and other ailments too. 2. Gotu Kola Gotu Kola also known as Indian Pennywort is commonly used in Traditional Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine. This bitter herb, taken in small quantities, can prove beneficial for blood circulation and control blood pressure. 3. Ashwagandha Ashwagandha or Indian Ginseng is a natural herb that you can add to your evening tea in small quantities. It has been proven to lower blood pressure along with acupressure points for blood pressure. Studies also suggest that it can reduce blood sugar levels in people with diabetes. 4. Garlic Garlic helps lower your blood pressure since it is a natural blood thinner and it reduces cholesterol levels. You can try consuming one clove of garlic in the morning as it will have multiple health benefits in the long run. 5. Honey If you consume two teaspoons of honey with warm water every morning, it can work wonders for your health. Honey is a great remedy to relax the walls of blood vessels and control blood pressure levels. You don't need to adopt all of these best ayurvedic medicines for blood pressure immediately.
